meanings.definition: The state of existing before something else
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, they believe in the preexistences of spirits.
meanings.sent2: The concept of preexistences is central to certain religious beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The idea of preexistences can be quite intriguing to ponder.
meanings.sent4: The preexistences of ancient civilizations can still be seen in their ruins.
meanings.sent5: The preexistences of myths and legends often hold valuable lessons.

meanings.definition: The belief in a previous existence or existence before birth
meanings.sent1: Her strong faith in preexistences shaped her worldview.
meanings.sent2: The concept of preexistences is deeply rooted in many spiritual traditions.
meanings.sent3: Some people find comfort in the idea of preexistences.
meanings.sent4: The notion of preexistences can be a source of solace in times of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the concept of preexistences can lead to profound insights.
